Configuration macros


Defines

#define STD_FILE_OPERATIONS_SUPPORT
#define VQ_HANDLER_SUPPORT
#define IPDR_UTILITIES

Define Documentation

#define IPDR_UTILITIES
 

Define IPDR_utilities if you want extra utility functions for debugging.

#define STD_FILE_OPERATIONS_SUPPORT
 

Define STD_FILE_OPERATIONS_SUPPORT if the target system supports standard file operations (using fopen, fread ...). Undefining the flag will disable support for sending data from a file in the simulator and using a startup script in the console.

#define VQ_HANDLER_SUPPORT
 

Define VQ_HANDLER_SUPPORT, if you want the client (transmitter) to be compiled with support for an internal queueing mechanism. Currently, this is the only kind of queueing supported.
